【All-Terrain Control】Effortlessly glide over sand, grass, and rough paths with wide, all-terrain wheels and 360° swivel front wheels. A responsive parking brake ensures secure stops on any incline, giving you complete command.
【Compact Fold & Easy Clean】The foldable cart folds down to a space-saving 11.4"D x 7.4"W x 22.4"H for compact storage. The removable,washable 600D Oxford fabric makes cleanup a breeze.

【Prompt Customer Support】 To ensure your satisfaction, we advise checking your product as soon as it arrives. Should anything not meet your expectations, reach out to our dedicated team. We're here to help and commit to providing a solution within 24 hours of your contact.
